translation: Thus I have heard: One time, when Bhagavān was staying in the city of Gayā, not long after he had attained enlightenment, accompanied by all the bhikṣus, some of them were able to attain a single fruit.

source_sentence: 及以二果、三、四果者，隨其得果所有功德皆悉明淨。
translation: And those with two fruits, three, and four fruits are all clearly purified according to the merits they attain.

source_sentence: 復有九十九億諸菩薩眾及二十八億諸天眾等，復有比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷無量眾數，
translation: There were also ninety-nine billion bodhisattvas and twenty-eight billion celestial beings, as well as an immeasurable number of monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen.

source_sentence: 及六萬力士、十二億等諸尼乾子，復有八萬四千五通仙人，復有五百諸外道等——皆悉以灰塗於身體，
translation: And there were sixty thousand strong men and twelve hundred million other Nirgranthas, as well as eighty-four thousand sages of the five supernatural powers and five hundred non-Buddhist heretics, all smeared their bodies with ashes.

source_sentence: 露現胸臆，肉盡脂消，唯餘皮骨，傴僂曲背，結髮自裹，披樹皮衣，手執瓶罐，
translation: They bared their chests, but all the flesh and fat disappeared. All that remained was skin and bones. Their backs were crooked and curved, and they wrapped themselves in fetters. They wore silk clothes made of bark o f sandalwood and carried jars and pitchers in their hands.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊如須彌山處黑山內，光明照耀，威德絕倫；
translation: At that time the World-honored One was resembling a polar mountain in the interior of a black mountain. His light shone brilliantly, and his majesty and virtue were beyond compare.

source_sentence: 如來世尊亦復如是，於諸仙中為最第一。
translation: The Tathāgata, the Bhagavān, is likewise, foremost among all the sages.

source_sentence: 又如六牙清淨白象獨自在於白羊群內、如月夜朗映蔽眾螢、如曼陀花生蘆葦町、如金翅鳥處在烏群；
translation: It is as if a pure white elephant with the sixteen-tusked color were to be alone in a herd of white sheep, like the moon shining brightly at night overshadowing all the fireflies, like the maṇḍala flower growing in the marsh where the reeds are planted, or like the golden-winged garuḍa among the crows.

source_sentence: 世尊於彼諸仙眾中亦復如是，威德照明倍復殊勝。
translation: Bhagavān, the Bhagavān is likewise among those sages, whose authoritative qualities and illumination are doubly superior.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即便入於寶捨三昧，現無量神通，普放淨光，遍身明耀，於身左右迭相交繞。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān had entered the samādhi of jealousy and equanimity, manifested measureless supernormal powers, radiated pure light all over his body, shining brightly, circled around him to his left and right.

source_sentence: 又於自身出無量億諸化佛身，一一化身復出無量億諸化佛。
translation: In his own body, he produces measureless millions of apparitional buddha bodies, and each apparitional body also produces measureless millions of apparitional bodies.

source_sentence: 復自身中出無量億諸菩薩身、無量帝釋身、無量梵王身、無量四天王身、無量百千阿羅漢身，
translation: In his own body were produced innumerable hundreds of millions of bodies of enlightening beings; innumerable bodies of Indra, Brahmā, Indra, Brahma, the four great deities, and countless hundreds of thousands of arhats.

source_sentence: 無量百千比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷身，無量大轉輪王身、無量小轉輪王身、無量粟散諸小王身、無量東海洲中邊地人身、無量南天竺等所有諸地一切人身，
translation: Innumerable hundreds of thousands of bodies of monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen; innumerable bodies of great universal monarchs; innumerable bodies of minor universal monarchs; innumerable bodies of the small kings of Jambudvfpa; innumerable bodies of people on the peripheral plains of

source_sentence: 無量剎利大姓、諸婆羅門等、大富長者一切人身。
translation: The bodies of measureless great warriors, brāhmaṇas, and other great wealthy people are all human beings.

source_sentence: 如是等種種形類、種種服飾、種種言說，所有一切諸天界分，一切皆從如來身出。
translation: All these various forms, various clothing, and various explanations of all the parts of the celestial realm all emerge from the Tathāgata's body.

source_sentence: 爾時，一切大眾各懷疑心，迭共相觀。
translation: At that point, all the people in the assembly doubted each other's minds and looked at each other.

source_sentence: 時諸菩薩皆大歡喜，雨諸珍寶供養之具乃至瓔珞，供養如來。
translation: The bodhisattvas then all rejoiced greatly, raining various treasures and offerings to the Tathāgata, including jewelry and necklaces.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊現是瑞已，還從寶捨三昧起。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān manifested this miraculous sign and returned from the samādhi of renunciation of treasure.

source_sentence: 從三昧起已，如師子王頻申顧視，普觀十方。
translation: After rising from that concentration, he's like a lion king who frequently looks around and observes the ten directions.

translation: Having surveyed the ten directions, they instantly saw all the buddha-lands in the worlds of the ten directions as well as this great chiliocosm Sahā. Observing them with the Buddha’s eye:

translation: It's clearly visible like in the palm of your hand.

source_sentence: 如此釋迦如來放大神通種種變現，十方一切諸佛亦復如是現化佛身，從化佛身示化佛身，
translation: “Just as the Buddha manifests in all kinds of manifestations by means of his mystic powers, so also do all buddhas in the ten directions manifest emanation buddha-bodies and show emanation buddha-bodies from emanation bodies.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來所有化佛皆來雲集世尊大會。
translation: All the transformation buddhas of those tathāgatas all came to the Bhagavān's great assembly.

source_sentence: 復有無量恒河沙等諸菩薩眾、比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷——過諸譬喻——各執種種供養之具，
translation: There were also innumerable other bodhisattvas, monks, nuns, laymen, and laymen as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River, each holding a variety of offerings.

source_sentence: 隨其所應堪供養者，來詣佛所。
translation: Those who can make offerings according to their abilities will come to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 復有天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等一切大眾，
translation: Again, there were gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, nonhumans, and other great assemblies.

source_sentence: 隨其住處皆見如來神通力已，從彼而來赴此海會。
translation: Wherever they live, they'll all see the Tathāgata's miraculous powers and come from there to this ocean assembly.

source_sentence: 爾時，十方諸來菩薩各以無上供養之具供養如來。
translation: At the time, the bodhisattvas who came from the ten directions each offered an unsurpassed offering to the Tathāgata with a set of offerings.

source_sentence: 設供養已，各以六波羅蜜之所成就師子高座，隨其身量稱座而坐；
translation: After they had set up the offerings, each was seated on a high seat of lion-seat made of the six transcendent ways, according to the measure of his body.

source_sentence: 乃至人非人等各稱身座，復座而坐。
translation: It's even when people and non-people each call themselves to their seats, return to their seats, and sit down again.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來所教化者——上至阿迦尼吒天、下至阿鼻地獄——所有化類皆悉而還。
translation: Those who are taught by the Śākyamuni Tathāgata - up to the Akaniṣṭha Heaven and down to Avīci Hell - return with all kinds of teachings.

source_sentence: 還已，當於是時以佛力故，皆見十方諸佛世界猶如一會。
translation: When he returned, it was then that, because of the Buddha's power, they all saw the buddha worlds in the ten directions as if they were one assembly.

source_sentence: 所有十方一切諸佛所教化者，一切皆從釋迦如來諸毛孔入；
translation: All the teachings of all buddhas of the ten directions entered from the pores of the Buddha Śākyamuni’s hair.

translation: The teachings taught by the Śākyamuni Tathāgata all entered through the pores of the Buddha's body.

translation: Listen attentively, receive attentively, and think well of it. I will give you an extensive explanation.

translation: You asked me, 'Where did the essence of sentient beings come from?'

translation: Great sage, you should know that there really are no words and no words or phrases to speak.

translation: Again, there are causes and conditions that give rise to sentient beings, which are called the mother as cause and father as condition that give birth to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 復次，父母和合以之為因，邪念妄想起諸業風，吹識種子置胎藏中，即是彼緣。

translation: Furthermore, the noble truth of suffering and the noble truths of arising, cessation, and the path are sentient beings.

translation: Furthermore, it's because the five aggregates are combined with the 18 elements that they are sentient beings.

translation: If the self-dependent body doesn't attain self-dependence, then what's called attaining self-dependence?

translation: Even if a firefly really can emit light that completely illuminates Jambudvīpa, it will never be able to cause someone without a suppressed mind to attain it, which is called truly unimpeded.

translation: If they are self-dependent and attain self-dependence, they should extinguish the stain of all afflictions.

source_sentence: 是諸天香又有微風徐徐而動，吹是香氣靉靆垂布，於如來前遍覆虛空。

translation: Again, there came from the ten directions various kinds of flowers, various ornaments, various jewels, various fragrances, various flower garlands, various ointments, various powdered incenses, various cloths, and various canopies.

source_sentence: 爾時，無能降伏大光明焰，上至阿迦尼吒天、下至阿鼻地獄，遍照十方一切諸佛大會之眾，
translation: At the time, there was no one able to subdue the great flame of light that went up to the Akaniṣṭha gods or down to the avīci hells and shone everywhere in all the buddha-ssemblies in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 圍繞一切彼諸如來。

translation: If another person were to explain this true teaching of the Dharma in a single phrase or verse, discerning it for others and revealing it, the merit gained would be greater than that.

translation: If someone says, 'This is the source of the Dharma,' and they can praise it there, saying, 'Good, good!' you should know that all the buddhas will praise them together.

translation: If someone can recite this sūtra once, twice, twice, or three times on their own and teach others to recite it, you should know that such a person invites the Tathāgata to turn the wonderful wheel of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 若有善男子於是經典若自抄寫、若教人抄，當知彼人即是受持一切諸佛甚深法藏，
translation: If there are any sons of a virtuous family who copy the scriptures themselves or teach others to copy those scriptures, know that they will preserve the profound treasure house of the teachings of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 常得歡喜，速獲安樂，於未來世當得作佛。
translation: They will always rejoice and quickly attain well-being, and in the future they will become buddhas.

translation: If there are good men and good women who should fall into hell, they'll never hear this subtle sūtra.

source_sentence: 諸善男子及善女人若得聞是妙經典者，捨是身已，必得生於清淨國土。
translation: If good men and good women hear this wonderful sūtra, they'll surely be born in a pure land if they abandon their bodies.

source_sentence: 「復次，善男子、善女人等得聞是經，聞已歡喜，信樂受持，廣為他人讀誦、解說，

translation: You should know that person who quickly attains enlightenment and doesn't forget right mindfulness when their six faculties are complete and their five eyes are purified before the end of their life.
